mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Porcellanidae (Crustacea: Decapoda: Anomura) from New Caledonia and the Loyalty Islands

tax:ref_group.tax:p: AnimaliaMalacostracaDecapodaPorcellanidaePorcellanamelissaspeciesMiyake, 1942: 367Porcellana melissaMiyake,1942:367 (part), text-fig.27 (notAnimaliaMalacostracaDecapodaPorcellanidaePorcellanamelissaspeciesMiyake, 1942P. melissaMiyake,1942).AnimaliaMalacostracaDecapodaPorcellanidaePorcellanapalauensisspeciesNakasone & Miyake, 1968c: 165Porcellana palauensisNakasone & Miyake,1968 c:165, fig.1, pl.7, fig. A.
AnimaliaMalacostracaDecapodaPorcellanidaeEnosteoideshainanensisspeciesYang & Sun, 2005: 19Enosteoides hainanensisYang & Sun,2005:19, figs. 15, 16 (type locality: HainanIsland) (new synonymy).

tax:div.tax:p: Material examined.Type material:Palau. Ngadarák Reef,Palau Islands, coll. S. Miyake,23 May1939, ovig. female CL3.6mm,holotype (ZLKU4266). Same data asholotype: ovig. female CL3.1mm,paratype (ZLKU4267).

New Caledonia. Kuendu Beach, lagoon,22 °23 ’S,166 °32 ’E,31 m,5 May1996, coll. B. Richer de Forges,2 females CL2.7, 3.0 mm. Namié, lagoon, low tide,3 Oct.1978, coll. C. Vadon,1 male CL6.1 mm. Récif Senez, lagoon,7 m,7 Sep.1992, coll. P. Bouchet,1 female CL4.2 mm.

Remarks. The specimens examined generally agree well with thetype material ofAnimaliaMalacostracaDecapodaPorcellanidaeEnosteoidespalauensisspeciesE. palauensis.Yang & Sun (2005) described a new species,AnimaliaMalacostracaDecapodaPorcellanidaeEnosteoideshainanensisspeciesE. hainanensis, from HainanIsland in the SouthChina Sea. They remarked that this species was very similar toAnimaliaMalacostracaDecapodaPorcellanidaeEnosteoidespalauensisspeciesE. palauensis, but distinguished by the carapace being more conspicuously areolated on the dorsal surface and by the shape of the basal article of the antennular peduncle being different. However, these distinctions are insufficient to distinguish the two species because thetype material ofAnimaliaMalacostracaDecapodaPorcellanidaeEnosteoidespalauensisspeciesE. palauensis in fact has the characters ofAnimaliaMalacostracaDecapodaPorcellanidaeEnosteoideshainanensisspeciesE. hainanensis. Therefore,AnimaliaMalacostracaDecapodaPorcellanidaeEnosteoideshainanensisspeciesE. hainanensis should be considered a synonym ofAnimaliaMalacostracaDecapodaPorcellanidaeEnosteoidespalauensisspeciesE. palauensis.

Distribution. HainanIsland inChina, andPalau (Nakasone & Miyake1968 c;Yang & Sun2005). The present record of the species fromNew Caledonia greatly extends its distribution to the southern hemisphere. The specimens examined were collected at depths of7–31 m.
